text: Brian Lyn (born 8 November 1961) is an Antiguan former cyclist. He competed in the sprint event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Antigua and Barbuda male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Antigua and Barbuda Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Brian Lyn
